--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus heard the alert and cursed under his breath. Could the rust 
plague be back?!
> He turns towards his quarters but sees that its already cealed off.
> Rodimus Prime: Be safe...
> He rushes off for the Commanders office.
>  airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Nightlight/Elita:
> 
> Elita woke up and started to cry, Nightlight looked worry "The 
> Plague"she tought while she remembered the history records that 
> Rodimus had showed her... Now how could she protect her baby? what 
> would happen with Rodimus???
> 
> She lock up the door of the quarters, all was sealed and locke up. 
> She tried to calm her baby down... Sudenly she opned her comlink to 
> Rodimus and said "Rodimus, please, be careful... I don't like lost 
> you..."
> 
> Tears fell from her eyes while she said that...
> 
> 
>
